version.author: binbinhfr
version.changelog: + v1.0 initial release + v1.1 correct default opening path, docking problems + v1.2 pre color next line, separate auto_resize options for playing and recording + v1.3 possibility to customize colors. + v1.4 option to choose number of visible lines before and after current one.
